Text: RE Hartley IA TBS Cc James As soon as we have a revised PPA invoice for October that we feel will be the final info could you fax a copy to me The customer is waiting for some other data from me that uses SMS and DDVC amounts for the past year and I cannot finish the info for him until we have this resolved Id like to call him and give him an update Do you know approximately when we might have the revised PPA Thanks Joni Original Message From Floyd Jodie Sent Thursday December PM To Adams Frankie Cc Zadow Raetta Carr James Bollinger Joni Blair Lynn Anderson Gary E Subject Hartley IA TBS Frankie the customer has requested that NNG reallocate the Hartley IA TBS Meter Number again for October Attached are the daily volume allocations that Clayton Energy has agreed to for the meter If you have any questions please give me a call j floyd File xls
